pageProduct.name: Replens Vaginal Moisturiser 10
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Replens Long-Lasting Vaginal Moisturiser lasts up to 3 days per application.

Vaginal dryness (Vaginal Atrophy) is the result of the natural ageing process. It not only affects lovemaking, but often leads to itching, irritation and discomfort. These common problems are caused by lack of natural moisture which originates inside the vagina. Replens replenishes this essential moisture.

Applied internally once every three days, Replens provides continuous moisture and comfort. Its regular use helps to maintain vaginal health. You may use Replens more or less often as needed, up to once per day.

Pre-filled applicators enable you to hygienically place the right amount of Replens exactly where it is needed, high up, inside the vagina.

Soothing relief from:

- Vaginal Atrophy and Dryness.

- Irritation.

- Discomfort.

Boxed Contents: 10 Pre-filled Single-use Applicators

Size: 10 Pack

KEY FEATURES

• Long-Lasting Vaginal Moisturiser
• Lasts Up to 3 Days Per Application
• Pre-filles Single-use Applicators
• Replenishes Moisture
• Hormone Free
• Suitable to use with polysioprene, polyurethane, and natural rubber latex condoms

Warnings

- If pregnant or breast-feeding, consult your healthcare provider before use.
- Keep out of reach of children.
- Do not use in children.
- If vaginal irritation occurs, discontinue use. If symptoms persist, contact your physician.
- Store at room temperature.

IMPORTANT INFORMATION

Replens is hormone free and suitable to use with polyisoprene, polyurethane, and natural rubber latex condoms.

Ingredients

Purified Water, Glycerin, Mineral Oil, Polycarbophil, Carbomer Homopolymer Type B, Hydrogenated Palm Oil Glyceride, Sorbic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide.

Directions

Adults: Apply once every 3 days, preferably in the mornings. See enclosed leaflet for details.

Ultra-Slim Comfortable Applicator pre-filled with the right amount of Replens Moisturiser.

STORAGE INSTRUCTIONS

Store at room temperature.
